body_html: @martinwicke No, it can't go in as-is since we need a workaround internally. sched_getaffinity() isn't provided by our Android NDK so we need to replicate the system calls it uses. I'll update once I get a chance to properly test the fix.

body: @martinwicke No, it can't go in as-is since we need a workaround internally. sched_getaffinity() isn't provided by our Android NDK so we need to replicate the system calls it uses. I'll update once I get a chance to properly test the fix.
